sourcesContent:
<ion-app>
  <ion-split-pane contentId="main-content">
    <ion-menu contentId="main-content" type="overlay">
      <ion-content>
        <ion-list id="inbox-list">
          <ion-list-header>Empreget</ion-list-header>
          <ion-note>Android/IOS</ion-note>

          <ion-menu-toggle auto-hide="false" *ngFor="let itemMenu of appPages; let i = index">
            <ion-item routerDirection="root" [routerLink]="[itemMenu.url]" lines="none" detail="false" routerLinkActive="selected">
              <ion-icon aria-hidden="true" slot="start" [ios]="itemMenu.icon + '-outline'" [md]="itemMenu.icon + '-sharp'"></ion-icon>
              <ion-label>{{ itemMenu.title }}</ion-label>
            </ion-item>
          </ion-menu-toggle>
        </ion-list>

        
      </ion-content>
    </ion-menu>
    <ion-router-outlet id="main-content"></ion-router-outlet>
  </ion-split-pane>
</ion-app>
